top.title: Putin says Russia ready to supply 'uninterrupted' fuel to India

top.title: Germany votes to bring back voluntary military service programme for 18-year-olds
top.summary: The shift in its approach to its military follows a push to create Europe's strongest conventional army.

top.title: Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom

top.title: New homes delayed by 'energy-hungry' data centres
